items.content_html: KnowYourClient is a powerful, lightweight JavaScript library that provides comprehensive client-side information detection. With a single function call, developers can access detailed data about a user's browser, operating system, device, and system capabilities.
items.title: akhlas17/knowyourclient: KnowYourClient is a powerful, lightweight JavaScript library that provides comprehensive client-side information detection. With a single function call, developers can access detailed data about a user's browser, operating system, device, and system capabilities.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central.
